message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DL 

This paper deals with text classification using cross-lingual data and neural networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP), which could place it in cs.IR and cs.AI, respectively. Finally, the paper uses convolutional and recurrent neural networks, which are subfields of deep learning (DL), making cs.DL a possible sub-category as well.
